scripts.clean: npm run clean:android && npm run clean:ios && npm run clean:metro
scripts.clean:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf android/app/build && rm -rf android/build
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build DerivedData && cd ..
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:modules
scripts.build:android: npm run clean:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:android:debug: npm run clean:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.build:ios: npm run clean:ios && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && react-native run-ios --configuration Release
scripts.build:ios:debug: npm run clean:ios && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && react-native run-ios
scripts.rebuild:android: npm run clean:android && npm run android
scripts.rebuild:ios: npm run clean:ios && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && npm run ios
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run rebuild:ios
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm install && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.reset:android: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run android
scripts.reset:ios: npm run clean:all && npm install && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && npm run ios
scripts.pod:repo:update: cd ios && pod repo update && cd ..
